reviews.sentence: GOOD HOTEL MISSING A GOOD GYM. It offers a good service. Bathrooms and GYM need to be upgraded.

Great choice definitely going back. Definitely worth spending the extra money to stay at the Royal Club. Excellent service and comfort. Very safe and close to everything one might for both sightseeing and business. The gym could have more equipment but it suffices for a vacation period.

One day getaway at El Embajador. Excellent service stayed at the Royal Club well worth its price great service and overall excellent stay. Only fault or complain its the so called spa no service steam room although great looking was not working as well as the Jacuzi pool staff was great and so were the services by the pool and restaurant. Just need to pay attention to details and please fix the spa a hotel of your reputation should not have a neglected spa.

One day getaway at El Embajador. Excellent service stayed at the Royal Club well worth its price great service and overall excellent stay. Only fault or complain its the so called spa no service steam room although great looking was not working as well as the Jacuzi pool staff was great and so were the services by the pool and restaurant. Just need to pay attention to details and please fix the spa a hotel of your reputation should not have a neglected spa.

Embassador Stay. I have been visiting this hotel for a number of years. overall the hotel is very good. service and food is of. a good standardthe Gym however need upgrading it is in need of new equipment there should be at lease 2 machines of each type.

Old favorite in need of a makeover. This is the hotel in Santo Domingo with the most history and character of the city hotels hime to Godfather Trujilo Food and Fashion Shows many Weddings once it was the top choice of the capital hotels. The top rooms are still the best deal private check in nice club area many amenities as well as a five star service. The restaurants are cleaned and well maintained just in need of an upgrade as far as restaurant concepts expensive and the food is good not great. Pool area as well as convention and business area are top notch. My only big criticism is the spa if you call it that no service old fashion ugly looking with the Jacuzi and steam room not working a shame that the spa does not match the overall excellent quality of the hotel Trujilo should be turning up in his grave.

The staff is great. I enjoyed my stay at El Embajador the staff and their service was outstanding. However the gym equipment was a bit antiquated the coffee a bit weak and the shower water temperature would fluctuate.

Good but might be better. The food was ok but not the best room size was great but bathroom could be bigger instead of having such a huge walking closet. The a c sound was too loud in the room an the gym is very very poor equipped and super small.

nice business hotel. hotel is a nice business hotel gym is poor being remodeled staff needs a bit of training especially coordinating airport pick up. the view of my room is green roof top. however being a business trip more than adequate noise in second floor was a disturbance late at night.

nice hotel for biz stay. It is a nice hotel with a beautiful garden in a very busy area. Restaurant food was good. i had chilo white fish which was very fresh and excellent. Some things that could be improved are the gym small number of machines right now and carpet looks old. I would stay again.

Beautiful hotel being renovated to be even nicer with a gorgeous Spa. The staff here is extremely nice always ready to help. The hotel grounds are well kept. The pool side has a cute cafe with a pizza counter and swings for kids. Their new Spa is beautiful and offers all the pampering you need ask for Madelaine and she will give u a genuine welcome.

Very good hotel. The Hotel is located in the center of the city with very good services and beautiful rooms. Is a classic hotel with modern details. Have fitness center pools and awesome backyard. All rooms have modern decoration.

yearly trip to santo domingo. The embajador is an old world hotel in the heart of the capital. We go every year as supporters of a dominican cycling team that competes in the vuelta independencia. My summary gorgeous mature gardens in back great new spa and gym newly remodeled rooms very swank. only issue is the power system is not that well though out and the plugs for your computer go out when the room senses that you have left. I have a workstation I bring for work and it goes out when the power goes out. I have told them about it but they were never able to fix this foir me.

Work hard Play Harder. I can say that phrase is for this hotel. Very good ambient and amenities exceletel pool and spa. The rooms are really nice and comfortable. I spent almost a month there and I felt like on Holidays. I did not give five start cus the food is not a the same level than the rest of the services.

A Return Visit to Hotel El Embajador. Hotel El Embajador is one of the most famous hotels in the Dominican Republic. Many well known people have visited there including Rafael Trujilo former Dominican dictator who was at the ribbon cutting ceremony back in 1956 President Lyndon Johnson King Juan Carlos II of Spain John Wayne Grace Kelly Carolina Herera and my wife and I not so well known. The movie industry is represented as well scenes from “ Godfather II ” and Andy Garcia ’s “ The Lost City ” were filmed at the hotel. El Embajador has been completely renovated since my last visit several years ago. The building and outdoor areas are exceptionally clean and well maintained. The staff is extremely professional. There is a beautiful pool with bar service a sizable lounge in the lobby with a bar and adjoining gift shop a gym spa party rooms casino and two wonderful restaurants. The food is fresh varied expertly presented and of course delicious. Their tropical fruits and jugos naturales freshly squeezed tropical juices are among their menu highlights. The waiters are very attentive. One of the most popular attractions at the hotel can be seen “ heard ” is a better word every evening throughout the year when a swarm of cotoras parrots arrives at nearly the same time each day to nest on the trees outside the hotel entrance and sing their “ songs ”. It is an incredible combination of sight and sound that lasts for hours. By morning they are totally gone. The hotel is located in the Bela Vista neighborhood of Santo Domingo. The closest beach is about thirty minutes away but there is a wonderful park within walking distance Mirador del Sur with its many paved trails small lake with boat rentals and an adjacent restaurant. Hotel El Embajador is a great place to stay if you are looking to spend a restful vacation made even better by quality service.

Mi casa es su casa. This place is a real find and my favourite in the Dominican Republic. I took the upgrade to the ambassador level and with that had the access to the private lounge area with its espresso style coffee all day snacks and a great light breakfast. It is not an ostentatious hotel and has a real Dominican feel to it. The room was spacious artistic and I took an ocean view and it had a giant bath tub great internal spa and jacuzi. The linen was impeccable and the bed turned down every night. I loved the pool area and the café near it too. The internet connection was strong from all areas of the Hotel which is a must for me. The staff were excellent and acomodating Rafael and Andreas on the desk. The hotel taxi driver Antonio is a gem It was not an expensive hotel and I felt I received great value for money. They tried to make me feel right at home mu I casa es su casa. It worked. I stayed twice and will be back soon.

El Embajador a Gem In Santo Domingo. I loved this hotel for all its amenities and service. The staff are great and the pool restaurants bar gym spa are first class. The rooms are comfortable and you will get a great nights sleep. I will be back. Thank you. D man.

Great room messy check in and could be better. I really thought the price for this hotel compared to the US was great. The check in process took way too long. I was in the Ambassador floor which is the 5th and upon booking my room was not told that I had a separate check in on that floor and all of the details of the hotel. I waited SO long. The ac in the general areas seem off or not strong enough so hot. Once on the 5th the staff person at the desk was not very friendly did not tell me about the hotels amenities and did not move me along the process well enough so I just sat there and had to ask how much longer to which she responded you are all set I was so upset and asked her why she did not let me know I was all set until I asked wasted time. The room was fantastic I paid for an upgrade to be on the ocean side and it was worth it. The room was so clean and really modern very quiet. I went to the spa got several services they fit me right in and the technicians were great. I ate at the restaurant closest to the pool it was meh for the price not worth it. I would recommend the restaurants outside of the hotel walking distance Muele 47 was so amazing best seafood ever great service worth the price. The laundry service ruined my clothes it was all worn out argh. Overall very safe place fantastic room ok service loved the lounge on the 5th. May be back.

Sarto Domingo. Excellent hotel with great amenities and very good spa. Good restaurants near by and good service. Well located with plenty of staff and available. Recommended for family with children with entertaining areas.
Exceptional. Very modern and comfortable hotel helpful staff nice location near a park to do sports.
